text:
Yoyo Wallet | London, UK | Permanent | On-site | https://yoyo.workable.com/jobs/281666

We're a group of ~15 software developers working in an engineering centric culture. We use contemporary tools and methodologies and are driven by the end user product.

We're looking to take on senior Python developers.

If you're looking for an engaging new opportunity or would just like to know more, please follow the link and apply and we look forward to discussing this in more details with you!
